N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.31 - Inspection and surveillance

State Regulations
(a) The
commission, its officers, agents and employees may inspect the operations of
waste treatment and in-plant control facilities of any waste discharger and may
install, operate and maintain facilities for monitoring and surveillance of
effluents as well as water quality objectives. (b) Provision for such monitoring and
surveillance shall be deemed to be part of every order, determination, or
permit of the commission approving an allocation or an abatement schedule for
any waste discharger. Notes
